title: Grilled courgettes with chickpeas & marjoram
directions: Soak the chickpeas in cold water overnight.
Drain the chickpeas and place in a saucepan. Cover with cold water and bring to the boil over a high heat for about 45 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside to cool.
Thinly slice the courgettes lengthways. Heat a heavy frying pan or griddle pan over a high heat. Brush the courgettes with oil and chargrill for 1 to 2 minutes each side, until tender.
Arrange the courgettes on a serving plate, scatter over the chickpeas, crumble over the goatâ€™s cheese and pick over the marjoram.
Season to taste, drizzle with the remaining oil and serve immediately, with lemon wedges for squeezi
ingredients: a few sprigs of fresh marjoram
